        public static Condition build(java.lang.String sqlPart)

      • build

        public static Condition build(java.lang.Class<?> queryObject)
        build the complete Condition which both has condition part WHERE and body part UPDATE,SELECT,DELETE
        Parameters:
        queryObject - Class 实体类型
        1.Entity子类默认第一个属性为ID列,类名需与表名一致
        2.JPA标注的实体类标准
        Returns:
        Condition
